queries.title: Morning Blood Sugar Issues
queries.description: I've been having higher blood sugars in the morning lately. My readings are usually around 140-160 mg/dL when I wake up, but they used to be around 110-120. I haven't changed my evening routine or medications. What could be causing this?
queries.expectedContext: Should reference her excellent control (HbA1c 6.9%), current medications, and 2+ years treatment history

queries.title: Exercise and Medication Timing
queries.description: I want to start a new exercise routine in the evenings. How should I adjust my Metformin and other medications? Should I take them before or after working out?
queries.expectedContext: Should reference her specific medications: Metformin 1000mg BID, Lisinopril, Empagliflozin

queries.title: College Life and Insulin Management
queries.description: I'm in college and my schedule is really irregular. Sometimes I eat at weird times or skip meals when I'm studying. My blood sugars are all over the place. How can I better manage my insulin pump with this crazy schedule?
queries.expectedContext: Should reference his Type 1 diabetes, insulin pump therapy, college age, and need for flexibility

queries.title: Party Drinking and Diabetes
queries.description: My friends want me to come to parties but I'm worried about drinking alcohol with my diabetes. Is it safe? How do I manage my blood sugar if I do drink?
queries.expectedContext: Should reference his young age, Type 1 diabetes, insulin pump, and need for safety precautions

queries.title: Kidney Function Concerns
queries.description: My last lab results showed my kidney function might be declining slightly. My doctor mentioned this could be related to my diabetes. Should I be worried? Do I need to change my medications?
queries.expectedContext: Should reference his cardiovascular history, current medications, and established kidney monitoring

queries.title: Pregnancy and Blood Sugar Control
queries.description: I'm pregnant again and my morning blood sugars are slightly elevated. I had gestational diabetes before. Should I start insulin now or wait? I'm worried about affecting the baby.
queries.expectedContext: Should reference her history of gestational diabetes, current pregnancy, and Type 2 diabetes progression

queries.title: Medication Confusion
queries.description: I keep forgetting whether I took my insulin this morning. Sometimes I take it twice by accident. My daughter is worried. Is there a better way to keep track?
queries.expectedContext: Should reference her age, cognitive considerations, current insulin regimen, and need for simplified management

access.note: Backend URLs provided by DFX after deployment
